content: Be sure to look to your right after defeating him, and you can spot a wooden platform beyond a tree along the walls that holds a **Treasure Chest** with materials inside.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
Be sure to look to your right after defeating him, and you can spot a wooden platform beyond a tree along the walls that holds a **Treasure Chest** with materials inside.
